fn.p: ap-value reflects chi-square test of all 3 race/ethnicity categories by MeDi group. Mean (SD) reported for continuous outcomes, percentages reported for categorical outcomes.
p-values reflect differences between MeDi groups based on one-way ANOVAs and Pearson’s chi-square tests.

WMH, white matter hyperintensities; DTI FA, fractional anisotropy; Scrub%, percentage of motion artifact removed; BN, between-network; WN, within-network; Δ, change from baseline to followup; FLUID, fluid reasoning; MEMORY, episodic memory; VOCAB, vocabulary; SPEED, perceptual speed.
